76450.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><turn_p:
I'm sorry, you have a visitor. I am Pirika, Mr. Sigal's secretary. My boss, Mr. Sigal, is an unparalleled lover of the sea.I was shocked
to realize that I can't swim, and I have been in bed for a while. However, he knew he couldn't stay in bed forever, so he jumped out
of bed with a full heart. My boss, you have a strong heart.

76451.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><turn_p:
My boss, Mr. Sigal, is an unparalleled lover of the sea.He was shocked to find out that he could not swim, and he was in bed for a while.
However, he knew he couldn't stay in bed forever, so he jumped out of bed with a full heart. My boss, you have a strong heart.

76452.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「カモメが オ:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Seagulls are calling me. But I can't swim. I
can't believe that the mayor of a port town is
Ka-Nazuchi. The irony is so great.

76453.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「カモメが オ: <attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Seagulls are calling me. But I can't swim.<bw_break>

76454.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><turn_p:
And who are you? I see. You are the monster master? I've heard that you're an excellent person, but this time I'd like to see how good
you are. Let's get down to business right away. Recently, there have been numerous sightings of a strange bird called "monster"
flying around Lendor. It's so creepy that we had the townsfolk check it out, and it turns out that the bird-monster is flying towards
Kamiharmui in Eltona Continent, which is right next door. However, it seems that the monster was lost around the south exit of Kamiharmui.
Since then, we have been unable to locate him.

76455.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「そこで お前:
So, I ask you monster masters to do something for me. I want you to stake out the south exit of Royal City Kamiharmui and find out the
whereabouts of the bird monster. Once you know the exact destination, you will go there and find out who he is. However, the purpose of
this request is to show you the power of the monster master. Make sure to work together with your companion, monster.

76456.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「じつは ここ:
In fact, recently there has been a steady stream of reports of sightings of a strange bird called "monster" flying around Lendor,
but we have not been able to identify it at all.

76457.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「いいか？ ま:
Okay, monster master. If you see a suspicious bird monster, follow its footsteps and find out who it is. If he looks really dangerous,
you can beat him up on the spot. But be sure to take your companion monster with you.

76458.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「ボスのサング:
The boss's Sunglasses shines brighter than usual. At times like that, he is burning to stand up for what he believes in. And you can
tell by the blackness of his sunglasses. The boss's beloved Lendor is facing an unprecedented crisis. Anyway, as for the
reward, I have sent it to Monster Master House, so you can pick it up from Mr. Klaha.

76459.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「ファーベルと:
I heard from a boy who calls himself Fabel. It seems that this Lendor is being targeted by some shady guys called "monster merchants.
This is a much bigger story than I expected, but I'm not going to sit on my hands and wait for them to come after me. I'm not going to
sit on my hands and wait for the next day to come. And I also found out that monster masteryou is capable of handling my request
with speed and accuracy. I'll be relying on you in the future as well.

76460.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「ボスのサング:
The boss's Sunglasses shines brighter than usual. At times like that, he is burning to stand up for what he believes in. And you can
tell by the blackness of his sunglasses. The Lendor that he loves so much is in danger like never before.

77454.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「カモメが オ:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>The seagulls are calling me. The time for
battle has come.

76499.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「じつは ファ:
I am the one who told Fabel where to find the monster merchant. I didn't really understand what was going on, and he complimented me on
how cool my silver goggles were, so I was a bit surprised. I am ashamed that I acted unbecoming of a secretary who must always keep
a cool head. Please protect Mr. Fabel.

76500.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「カモメが オ:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>The seagulls are calling me. The time for
battle has come.<bw_break>

76501.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><turn_p:
And you, monster master, what do you want from me? Well, you want to know where the monster merchant is so you can help a boy named Fabel.
I see. That's convenient. As a matter of fact, we were planning to ask for the monster master's help in preventing the monster
merchants' plan to destroy Lendor Island. We found out that Imui Underground Cave in Eltona Continent was the monster merchants' Horse
Mackerel. Fabel must be there too. Imui Underground Cave is located at Kamiharmui North, just outside the north exit of Royal
City Kamiharmui. It should be easy to find on the map.

76502.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「まもの使いよ:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>I'm counting on you, monster master. Save my
beloved Lendor.

76503.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><turn_p:
Imui Underground Cave in Eltona Continent. I found out that it is the Horse Mackerel of the monster traders. Fabel must be there too. Imui
Underground Cave is located at Kamiharmui North, just outside the north exit of Royal City Kamiharmui. It should be easy to find on
the map.

76504.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「まもの使いよ:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>I'm counting on you, monster master. Save my
beloved Lendor.

76505.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「愛するレンドア:
Peace has come to our beloved Lendor, but the boss still has his poker face on. But I didn't miss it. I didn't miss the glowing Kirari
spilling out from under his Sunglasses. But that aside, I have also sent this reward to the Monster Master House, so please pick it up
from Mr. Klaha.

76506.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「メドウと名乗:
A madam named Meadow came in carrying a monster merchant. I heard all about it from her. The monster master named
has successfully defeated the monster merchant's ambitions and saved my beloved Lendor. I thank you, monster master, and your
name will be forever remembered as the savior of my Lendor.

76507.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「愛するレンドア:
Peace has come to our beloved Lendor, but the boss still has his poker face on. But I didn't miss it. I didn't miss the glowing Kirari
spilling out from under the boss's Sunglasses.
